features: OUR NEXT GENERATION ALUMINUM FREE DEODORANT: Feel the confidence of 72h breathable deodorant for women without aluminum, parabens or baking soda. Superpowered with vitamins!
REVOLUTIONARY VITAMIN SCIENCE: Dove VitaminCare+ is enriched with skin-loving Vitamin B3 (yes, the famous Niacinamide!). Groundbreaking research has found that B3 helps skin’s natural odor defense.
HEALTHIER FEELING SKIN: Upgrade your underarm skincare with our powerful triple-action formula. It works to help repair the skin barrier, even skin tone and instantly moisturizes to soothe dryness.
LIGHTWEIGHT & BREATHABLE: Our invisible formula glides on clear without stickiness or heavy white marks. For breathable odor protection that leaves you feeling comfortable and #FreshFreshFresh.
IRRESISTIBLE FRAGRANCES: Experience ultimate freshness with Raspberry & Rose. Fun, fresh, fruity and floral, this scent complements your spirit and layers well with almost any perfume.
CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN: Globally, Dove deodorant does not test on animals and is certified cruelty-free by PETA.
body.description: Want an alu-free deodorant, but natural deodorant isn’t cutting it? Introducing new Dove VitaminCare+, our next generation of aluminum free deodorants for 72h of long-lasting, vitamin-enriched odor control. Our new vitamin-fortified formula helps skin’s natural odor defense whilst renewing skin to look and feel healthy again. All in a deodorant that’s free from aluminum! Why Vitamins in a Deodorant? Your skin contains natural odor fighting molecules called Anti-Microbial Peptides (AMPs). Recent research has discovered that Vitamin B3 (AKA Niacinamide) partners with these AMPs, helping skin naturally protect itself from odor. Inspired by this cutting-edge science, we have fortified our effective deodorizing agents with Vitamin B3 for an added layer of odor protection. Dove VitaminCare+ gives you 72h of odor control fortified with Vitamin B3! You may already use Niacinamide in your skincare routine, but did you know it also works on your underarm skin? Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) doubles as a skincare powerhouse, deeply nourishing and renewing skin... Like a mini facial for your underarms! It works to help repair the skin barrier, even skin tone and moisturize skin to soothe dryness that may be caused by waxing, shaving or rubbing against clothes. Feel the freedom of a lightweight and breathable formula that glides on clear for ultimate comfort… Invisible odor control with no clumps and no heavy white marks. Dove VitaminCare+ is available in six delicious and indulgent scents, bursting full of freshness. Created to be true to the natural scent of the ingredient and smell fresh as you apply, these scents will keep giving throughout the day, without being overpowering. Discover a new signature scent of feel-good freshness in your deo for the right start to your day. Supplement your underarms with Dove VitaminCare+ Raspberry & Rose deodorant for women today and experience the vitamin difference yourself! How will you feel when your deodorant is #SuperpoweredWithVitamins? Dove is certified cruelty-free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We’re on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem – because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove antiperspirants and deodorants deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously. Explore our wide range of Dove Deodorant products available including dry spray deodorant, antiperspirant for sweat and deodorant without aluminum. Find the best deodorant for your skin care routine.

Dove VitaminCare+ Coconut & Shea Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Dove VitaminCare+ Lavender & Chamomile Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Dove VitaminCare+ Cucumber & Melon Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Feel your most confident self with Coconut & Shea. Milky, sweet, comforting and delicious. This creamy and indulgent scent is one of our favorites. Feel rejuvenated with Lavender & Chamoline. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be afraid of aluminum free no more
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive under arms that have lately been irritated by my standard deodorants like Secret, but whenever I try a natural alternative I smell or hate the smell.This feels so gentle and nourishing and smells divine! Very subtle so just for me but I feel confident and protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dove VitaminCare+ Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick Raspberry & Rose
reviews.reviewText: I love the fragrance of this, I haven't had a deodorant that smelled like this before. It is sweet, and more of a fruity/raspberry scent, I can't personally decipher the other part of the scent as rose, raspberry is definitely the prominent fragrance that matches well with my body sprays. It glides on easy and is more of a gel type formula, less is more and I apply with lighter pressure than I would with other stick deodorants. I don't personally think this is a 72hour deodorant, for me it's more of a 12 hour, apply each morning kind. The scent is still there the next morning, but it is very faint. It does not have the staying power or the strong scent like others I've tried such as Lume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent! Glides on super smooth!
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent! This raspberry rose scent combination is awesome! I never would have thought to combine those two scents. Glides on super smooth and has a wide coverage head. Very breathable for the skin. Definitely lasts the whole day, but I am not going to see if it lasts 72 hours - I am just not the type to take that risk! It is aluminum free which is awesome. They add vitamin care with B3 for natural odor prevention, which makes it unique. The only downside is that it is not an antiperspirant, which I need because I sweat a lot. All in all, I'm pleased with the scent and breathability but if I'm going to be somewhere on a hot day, I'm going to go with an antiperspirant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for something without aluminum, parabens or baking soda then you have come to the right place. This deodorant smells so good too. Real clean smelling. They do claim that you get 72 hours of protection but I am not going to test that one out! 😂 It does glide on clear and didn't irritate my skin in the least. I am a fan of Dove soap and now of their deodorant. I have only had it on for an hour or so and love it. If something changes I will come on back here and update but I think I love this stuff! Little tiny bit on the pricey side is my only con. Other than that I do recommend. SMELLS SOOOO GOOD!!! 😋

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This Dove User is Unimpressed
reviews.reviewText: I have used Dove products for years: beauty bar, body wash, Clinical Strength deodorant, and aerosol deodorant. Now, even in the midst of hot flashes, I am fortunate not to sweat under my arms (just everywhere else--fun), so I didn't think it would be an issue to use a product that is solely a deodorant without an anti-perspirant.While I loved the light, fruity-floral smell of this deodorant, the actual product made my underarms feel positively moist--not wet, moist. Gross. At first, I figured it would go away after it had a chance to dry, but after a half an hour, it was clear that I was wrong. I was about to head out with my family, and I knew I'd be so distracted and irritable by the miserable sensation, so I ran upstairs and put my regular Dove over it. So. Much. Better.If the Clinical variety is ever made in the raspberry and rose scent, I will snatch it right up, but from now on, I'm steering clear of this VitaminCare+ stick. I can also easily envision it getting on and rubbing into the fiber of my clothes and eventually ruining them under the armpit area, and I don't have the time, money, or inclination to get a new wardrobe because of a stick of deodorant. This is a hard pass for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my new favorite deoderant
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough good things about this deodorant. I will be using this as my go to from now on. First, it's a generous size stick. Second, it smells absolutely amazing. It glides on easily and dried quickly. The most important thing is that it works! I don't get smelly later in the day. It just does exactly what I need it too while smelling great. Love love love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick
reviews.reviewText: -You get 2.6 oz of Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick and it is made in Canada-It contains no aluminum, baking soda and parabens-It contains fragrance and smells like Raspberry & Rose-I use it on my underarm and it goes on clear and does not stain clothings-It gives great protection against odor-I wish this is scentless or at least less fragrance in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, works nicely
reviews.reviewText: The first day I tried this I had really irritated arm pits at the end of the day but subsequent uses went perfectly. I really like this and think it's worth trying :)
